de.dosmike.sponge.megamenus.api.elements.concepts

Interface IInventory<X extends IInventory>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MSlot

    public interface IInventory<X extends IInventory>
    Elements that represent a inventory of some kind an can have a slot change

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fireSlotChangeEvent(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer, SlotChange change)
      Called by the renderer to inform the element that the slot has changed.
      This method has to be implemented by the IElement implementation.
      java.util.Optional<org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStack> getItemStack() 
      OnSlotChangeListener<X> getSlotChangeListener()

      replaces the currently displayed itemstack with the provided item

      replaces the currently displayed ItemStack with the provided item

      replaces the currently displayed itemstack with the provided item
      void setSlotChangeListener(OnSlotChangeListener<X> listener)
      Replace the current listener for this object.
      Note: Access control should not be performed by the listener, but instead through setting the proper access value for the IElement
      boolean testAccessPut(org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStackSnapshot subject)
      Function to test, whether the specified item can be put into this slot
      boolean testAccessTake(org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStackSnapshot subject)
      Function to test, whether the specified item can be taken out of this slot

    • Method Detail

      • setSlotChangeListener

        void setSlotChangeListener(OnSlotChangeListener<X> listener)
        Replace the current listener for this object.
        Note: Access control should not be performed by the listener, but instead through setting the proper access value for the IElement
        Parameters:
        listener - the new slot change listener

      • getSlotChangeListener

        OnSlotChangeListener<X> getSlotChangeListener()
        Returns:
        The currently assigned slot change listener used when firing a slot change, or null if unset

      • fireSlotChangeEvent

        void fireSlotChangeEvent(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer,
                         SlotChange change)
        Called by the renderer to inform the element that the slot has changed.
        This method has to be implemented by the IElement implementation.
        Parameters:
        viewer - the viewer that caused the slot change / is currently viewing this element
        change - the simplified SlotChange object containing more information

      • testAccessPut

        boolean testAccessPut(org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStackSnapshot subject)
        Function to test, whether the specified item can be put into this slot
        Returns:
        true if the item can be put in

      • testAccessTake

        boolean testAccessTake(org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStackSnapshot subject)
        Function to test, whether the specified item can be taken out of this slot
        Returns:
        true if the item can be taken out

      • getItemStack

        java.util.Optional<org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStack> getItemStack()
        Returns:
        the mutable ItemStack held in this slot

      • setItemStack

        void setItemStack(org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStackSnapshot snapshot)
        replaces the currently displayed ItemStack with the provided item
        Parameters:
        snapshot - the new item to display
